2.0.1.en: Fixed error code of -1 showing as the current power. Added support for LW929

2.0.2.en: removed markdown and version log from readme.txt

2.0.3.en: Added support for LW821 and L82 plus changed id field for compatability with the L82

2.0.4.en: Fixed missing getData in the socket device, added "homeyCommunityTopicId" and "homepage", added device name to webhook data log

2.0.5.en: Fixed typo in settings page that prevented logging being switched on

2.0.6.en: Fixed error when getting the current dim value when a light is switched on

3.0.1.en: Updated to SDK3 for Homey cloud compatability

3.1.0.en: Now using faster http library. Slowed down device initialisation so LW rate limit is not exceed. Added option to send diagnostic log.

3.1.1.en: Removed cloud compatability so it can be published.

3.1.4.en: Added retry to failed initialising devices.

3.1.5.en: Fix failure to complete device init caused by last update.

3.1.7.en: Add support for L70 Motion sensor.

3.1.8.en: Add support for L40 Socket Smart Plug-in.

3.1.9.en: Changed the device name of the Motion Sensor (it was Contact Sensor).
